problem.markdown:
1. Principle plane is a plane on which the shear stress is
() Minimum () Maximum (x) Zero () None of the above
2. In shear test conducted for mild steel rod( M.S.R), mild steel plate( M.S.P) and timber( T), which is the correct order of shear strength obtained
() M.S.R in double shear > M.S.P in double shear > Timber in single shear () Timber in single shear > M.S.R in double shear > M.S.P in double shear (x) M.S.P in double shear > M.S.R in double shear > Timber in single shear () M.S.R in double shear > Timber in single shear > M.S.P in double shear
3. For two equal uniformly loaded spans, the interior reaction is _____the shear at that location.
() None of the above (x) Twice () 5/8 () Half
4. Shear stress is maximum at the neutral axis. ( Say true or false)
() False (x) True

2. In shear test conducted for mild steel rod( M.S.R), mild steel plate( M.S.P) and timber( T), which is the correct order of shear strength obtained

choicegroup.choice: M.S.R in double shear > M.S.P in double shear > Timber in single shear
Timber in single shear > M.S.R in double shear > M.S.P in double shear
M.S.P in double shear > M.S.R in double shear > Timber in single shear
M.S.R in double shear > Timber in single shear > M.S.P in double shear
